name: Parking Lot
description: The PrestoCorp parking lot is a bustling hub of activity with cars lined up neatly. Anticipation fills the air as you embark on your quest for truth and justice. A large [tree] stands by the entrance, it offers a moment of calm amidst the corporate chaos.
short_description: The parking lot is busy today. A [tree] provides shade to the entrance to the buklding.
directions: The Parking Lot is connected to the [Reception Area] to the north.
